    // Simulated Annealing Parameters
    double initial_temp = compute_initial_temp_simplified(current_tour, dist_matrix, n, gen);
    double temp = initial_temp;
    double cooling_rate = 0.992; // Can be tuned. Slower cooling (e.g., 0.9999) means longer runtime but potentially better results.
    double min_temp = 1e-5;     // Temperature at which to stop
    long max_iterations_at_temp = n * 100; // Number of iterations at each temperature level
DIMENSION : 980
